snippet.title: The secret of Monkey Island RECODED (longplay)
snippet.description:
A free point and click adventure fan game from Daniele Spadoni. It is a re-invention of the classic Monkey Island 1 with a slightly different plot, a whole new set of puzzles which will keep you alert and interested. The game is well balanced and smooth to play through. It uses references to other Lucasfilm games which is a great add-on and is extremely satisfying. The game is quite long for a fan game, more or less 3 hours. And, on top of all of it, it's a free game. Can we actually ask for more?
#pointandclick #retrogaming #adventure #monkeyisland #guybrush #lechuck #free
